author: CBS News
title: "I Love Rock and Roll" songwriter dies of virus complications
description: "I Love Rock and Roll" that became a signature hit for fellow rocker Joan Jett
content:
Alan Merrill - who co-wrote the song "I Love Rock and Roll" that became a signature hit for fellow rocker Joan Jett - died Sunday in New York of complications from the coronavirus, his daughter said. He was 69.
Laura Merrill said on her Facebook account that… [+1676 chars]
